title: Design and Implementation of Effective Learning Strategies in Blended Learning Environments for Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and experience in self-directed learning
context.additional_context: In smartphone-centric restricted technology environments, customized learning strategies require real-time data collection and analysis

learning_goals: Learners can establish study plans using time management tools in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can diagnose their learning strategies through data-driven analysis and propose at least three improvement measures.
Learners can apply deep learning strategies (e.g., concept linking, critical thinking) with over 70% engagement in blended offline-online activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
